nodes.text: The Star Wars Compendium #3 was published in Summer 1982 by Paradise Press. The cover price was $1.95 in the US and 95p in the UK.
The magazine collected a number of articles from Star Wars Official Poster Monthly and The Empire Strikes Back Official Poster Monthly.
Special issue packed with in-depth articles and scores of color photographs collected in one volume from the original series of Star Wars and The Empire Strikes Back official publications.
